tool.name: Target regions on chromosomes

param.name: input1
param.label: BED file with non-overlapping genomic positions

param.name: input2
param.label: Tab-separated file with chromosome names and their sizes

tool.help: This tools infers regions present on chromosomes based on BED file with non-overlapping positions covered by reads and a tab-separated file with chromosome names and their sizes. Outputs pdf plot of pairwise distances (lower in target regions) and tabular file with inferred regions and their parameters. Sort it by ascending pd.mean (mean pairwise distance between consecutive positions) to get top target regions.
